title: Stop Losing Fashion Shoppers After the First Question: A 3-Step Playbook
excerpt: Learn how apparel brands cut first-reply time from 2 hours to 30 seconds and recover 12% more sales—without hiring.
author: Eli Park

content.intro:
⚡ **Quick stat:** 80 % of fashion shoppers abandon chat if they wait more than two minutes. In fast-moving DTC apparel, slow support is silent churn.

This playbook shows you how to slash first-reply time to under 30 seconds in three laser-focused steps—no extra headcount, no custom code.

sections.body:
Pull the last 90 days of chats. Tag each with *Order Status*, *Sizing & Fit*, or *Returns*. Across 37 apparel stores we sampled, these three made up **72 %** of pre-purchase conversations.

> **Pro tip:** Prioritize sizing questions—they convert at 1.8× higher than order-status checks.

sections.h2: 2. Launch Instant Answers in Minutes—not Sprints
sections.body:
With Garrio's Shopify-native AI you paste your size-chart URL, hit **Train**, and publish. No NL training loops or JSON fiddling.

```bash
# One-click CLI example
garrio train --source https://yourstore.com/size-chart
```

sections.h2: 3. Route Edge-Cases to Action—not Dead Ends
sections.body: Set an automation rule: *If query contains `damage`, escalate to Garrio human agents*. Our team resolves these in under 4 hours on average—keeping founders out of the inbox.
